info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 12:49PM EDT until April 9 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Indiana...
Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Berrien, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties.
Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties.
Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Cass MI, St. Joseph and Berrien Counties.
For the Saint Joseph River Michigan...including Three Rivers, Mottville, Elkhart IN, South Bend, Niles...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Elkhart River at Goshen.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Some residential and commercial properties near SR 119 are affected by high water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 7.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 7.8 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 700 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY MORNING
